short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your task by assigning points

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app helps you maintain a good habit and get closer to your goal.
It works by dividing the big task into several concrete sub-tasks and let you keep tracking the progress.
